pullRequest.body: Now that `NeZero` is in Lean, `Fin.ofNat'` already means the right thing.

nodes.body:
### PR summary [d8fa3ba32d](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/17759/commits/d8fa3ba32d80effa3970017e4e68a81777ef0beb)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ ofNat'_eq_cast`
`- instance {n : ℕ} [NeZero n] : One (Fin n) := ⟨ofNat'' 1⟩`
`- instance {n : ℕ} [NeZero n] : Zero (Fin n) := ⟨ofNat'' 0⟩`
`- ofNat''_eq_cast`
`- ofNat'_one`
`- ofNat'_zero`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

Thanks :tada: 

If CI passes, please remove the label `awaiting-CI` and merge this yourself, by adding a comment `bors r+`.

bors d+

:v: kim-em can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11359711587/job/31596227527)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11359711587/job/31596227676)
Should these be deprecated? What replaces them?
Testing these with `by simp`, it seems that they have no replacement, and so these should neither be deleted nor deprecated.
Good catch, thanks! Not sure what happened there.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: deprecate Fin.ofNat''
